extension.name: Simple File Upload v1.2 (J1.6)
extension.author: Anders Wasen
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Anders Was√©n. All rights reserved.
extension.description: A simple upload module. Will allow a user to upload a file to the given folder fetched from the parameter settings.

field.name: upload_location
field.label: Default Upload Location
field.description: This is the directory where uploaded files are placed if there are no user directories given below (NB! Server path, not web URL)

field.name: upload_maxsize
field.label: Max. Upload Size (bytes)
field.description: This is the maximum allowed upload file size in bytes

field.name: upload_capthca
field.label: Use Captcha
field.description: Force the user to add a Captcha code to be able to upload.

field.name: upload_capthcacase
field.label: CaSe-iNsEnSiTiVe Captcha
field.description: Ignore case for Captcha code.

field.name: upload_capthcacasemsg
field.label: Show message for CaSe-iNsEnSiTiVe Captcha
field.description: Show a small text that Captcha code is CaSe-insensitive (Only when CaSe-iNsEnSiTiVe Captcha is used).

field.name: upload_email
field.label: Send e-mail at upload
field.description: If you want an e-mail confirmation sent out when there is a new upload enter the e-mail address here (use comma between addresses to add more than one). Leave it blank to not send e-mail.

field.name: upload_emailmsg
field.label: Show 'message sent' to user
field.description: Write 'message sent' on pop-up so user knows Admin has been notified.

field.name: upload_emailhtml
field.label: Use HTML formated e-mail
field.description: Send e-mail in HTML format, else plain-text is used.

field.name: upload_fileexist
field.label: If file exist
field.description: Operation to take incase the uploaded file already exists. Backup - Copies to old file with a new name (adds date); Replace - Removes the existing file; Fail - Notify user the upload failed due to existing file.

field.name: upload_multi
field.label: Allow multiple upload
field.description: Allow user to add files dymamically and upload at the same time.

field.name: upload_maxmulti
field.label: Max. for multiple uploads
field.description: This is the maximum allowed number of files to upload at one time. Leave blank for unlimited.

field.name: upload_filetypes
field.label: Allowed filetypes (separate by semi-colon). Asterisk (*) allows any type.
field.description: This is a list of allowed filetypes (separated by semi-colon). Put a [*] (asterisk) to allow any type.

field.name: upload_donate
field.label: Do you like it?
field.description: Feel like showing your appreciation?

field.name: settingids
field.label: Allowed users
field.description: This is a list of users allowed to upload files.

field.name: upload_usernameddir
field.label: Use User Named Directories
field.description: Will use sub-directory for selected users named as username

field.name: upload_usernameddirdefault
field.label: ONLY show user named directory
field.description: Will omit the default directory from directory list. Directory list will only be shown if User Defined Directory is also used

field.name: upload_userlocation
field.label: User named directories root path
field.description: This is the directory where uploaded files for user specific files are placed (NB! Server path, not web URL)

field.name: settingidsund
field.label: User named directories for these users
field.description: This is a list of users who will have user named directories.

field.name: upload_createdir
field.label: Allow Create Directory (if missing)
field.description: Will allow SFU to create User directories, else the directories must be manually created

field.name: settingidsudd
field.label: Userdefined directories for these users
field.description: This is a list of users who will have user defined directories.

field.name: upload_unzip
field.label: Allow unzip/untar on server
field.description: Use unzip/untar for archives (going to Upload Location above).

field.name: upload_showerrmsg
field.label: Show error message
field.description: Show a detailed error message to the user.

field.name: upload_redirect
field.label: Redirect URL
field.description: A URL for redirect of browser after upload. Can not be used with pop-up or advanced pop-up.

field.name: upload_advancedpopup
field.label: Show advanced pop-up
field.description: Shows an advanced pop-up with more detailed information.

field.name: upload_showdircontent
field.label: Show files in upload directory in advanced pop-up
field.description: Shows a list of files in advanced pop-up.

field.name: upload_username
field.label: Username for validation
field.description: You can set a username (not Joomla user) that must match this for a user to be allowed to upload files.

field.name: upload_password
field.label: Password
field.description: This is the password to go wih the above user.

field.name: upload_stdbrowse
field.label: Standard Browse button
field.description: Use the standard Browse button and not image

field.name: upload_filewidth
field.label: File textbox width (chars)
field.description: The width in number of characters of the file text-box (only for the standard browse button).

field.name: upload_capthcaheight
field.label: Captcha image height
field.description: The height of the Captcha image.

field.name: upload_capthcawidth
field.label: Captcha image width
field.description: The width of the Captcha image.

field.name: upload_capthcabg
field.label: Captcha Background colors (RGB 0-255)
field.description: You can set the background color for the CAPTCHA image. Start value and end value must be set, values allowed are 0-255 where 0 is black and 255 is white. Color is then randomized using start-end values.

field.name: upload_bgcolor
field.label: Pop-up background color
field.description: The background color of the information pop-up

field.name: upload_popshowpath
field.label: Show filename/path
field.description: Show the filename and path of uploaded file.

field.name: upload_popcaptchamsg
field.label: Show faulty Captcha pop-up
field.description: Show the message about faulty Captcha in the pop-up,not in the Module window.

field.name: upload_popshowbytes
field.label: Show file-size in bytes
field.description: Show the file-size in bytes.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: Module Class Suffix
